entry.title: $2650 // easy move, no fee! very close to the trains
entry.content:
CHECK OUT THIS GORGEOUS THREE BEDROOM APARTMENT BEFORE IT'S GONE!!! YOU WILL LOVE IT AND WANT TO LOCK IT U RIGHT AWAY!!! DON'T WAIT TILL IT'S TOO LATE!!!
GORGEOUS NEW GUT RENOVATED THREE BEDROOM APARTMENT IN THE HOTTEST AREA OF CROWN HEIGHTS!!!

*Please Provide CELL Number For Best Communication*

*Net effective pricing on an 18 month lease*

THIS IS A SPACIOUS APARTMENT WITH AMAZING AMENITIES!

*Brand New Modern Kitchen
*Stainless Steel Appliances
*Split Unit Air Condition and Heat
*Tons of Natural Lighting Throughout The Apartment
*Hardwood floors in the ENTIRE Apartment
*Modern Tiled Bathroom With a Tub

Just a short walk from Prospect Park!!!

Right next to the S,A,C,2,3,4, and 5 trains, making it a short ride to the city!

AMAZING location, walking distance from great restaurants, shops, grocery stores, bars, and much more!!!

***PETS ALLOWED***
***NO FEE***
***GUARANTORS WELCOME***

Call or email TODAY for a PRIVATE showing before it's gone!
